detectors.description:

detectors.description:
EtherLotto.play() (shared/time_manipulation/ether_lotto/ether_lotto_2round.sol#13-25) uses a dangerous strict equality:

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in EtherLotto.play() (shared/time_manipulation/ether_lotto/ether_lotto_2round.sol#13-25):
	External calls:
	- bank.transfer(FEE_AMOUNT) (shared/time_manipulation/ether_lotto/ether_lotto_2round.sol#21)
	- msg.sender.transfer(pot - FEE_AMOUNT) (shared/time_manipulation/ether_lotto/ether_lotto_2round.sol#22)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pot = 0 (shared/time_manipulation/ether_lotto/ether_lotto_2round.sol#23)
